2025-11-02.title: Village of Grayslake Civic Alerts & News
2025-11-02.description: The Village of Grayslake posts ongoing community alerts, announcements, and reminders (including community garden updates and service notices) on its CivicAlerts page. Residents can check the page for the latest local government news and upcoming municipal events.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Central to Present 'Sideways Stories' Production
2025-11-02.description: Grayslake Central High School will be presenting a theatrical production of 'Sideways Stories' as part of their cultural programming. This event showcases student talent and creativity.

2025-11-02.title: Visit Lake County events calendar (ongoing listings)
2025-11-02.description: Visit Lake County maintains a public events calendar listing festivals, exhibits, and seasonal events across Lake County. The calendar is the primary source for upcoming county-wide entertainment and tourism events.

2025-11-02.title: Medline Celebrates New Flagship Distribution Center in Grayslake
2025-11-02.description: Medline has opened a new flagship distribution center in Grayslake, enhancing local employment opportunities and supporting the community's economy.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Community Garden
2025-11-02.description: The Grayslake Community Garden is a local initiative aimed at promoting gardening and community involvement. Residents are encouraged to participate and grow their own plants in a supportive environment.

2025-11-02.title: Building Pathways: Grayslake D127's Summer Manufacturing Camps
2025-11-02.description: Grayslake D127 is hosting summer manufacturing camps aimed at empowering students and strengthening ties with the local industry. This initiative focuses on education and career readiness.

2025-11-02.title: Grayslake Chamber Of Commerce Events
2025-11-02.description: The Grayslake Chamber of Commerce is organizing various events to foster community growth and business connections. These events are designed to engage local residents and businesses.

2025-11-02.title: Governor Pritzker announces Cache Energy expansion in Illinois
2025-11-02.description: State press release: Cache Energy plans an expansion that includes new manufacturing equipment and an on-site production line, emphasizing use of Illinois-based vendors and boosting local workforce opportunities. The announcement highlights state support for manufacturing growth in the region.

2025-11-02.title: SWALCO 'Shoes, Shred, and Seeds' community collection (Wauconda partnership)
2025-11-02.description: The Solid Waste Agency of Lake County (SWALCO) is partnering with the Village of Wauconda for a Shoes, Shred, and Seeds event offering shoe collection, document shredding, and seed/plant related activities for residents. Details and participation instructions are posted on the SWALCO site.

2025-11-02.title: Central Range redevelopment project in Grayslake
2025-11-02.description: The Village of Grayslake's Central Range redevelopment project is an ongoing land-use initiative expected to generate significant property tax revenue and spur local economic development. Project pages provide updates on planning, expected impacts, and next steps.

2025-11-02.title: College of Lake County â€” News & Events (Grayslake campus updates)
2025-11-02.description: College of Lake County's News & Events page posts ongoing campus news, installations, and program announcements for the Grayslake campus and other locations. The page is a source for upcoming college events, public programs, and institutional updates.
